name: NSAccessibility.Action
desc: Constants that describe types of actions.

items.name: static let cancel: NSAccessibility.Action
items.desc: An action that cancels the operation.

items.name: static let confirm: NSAccessibility.Action
items.desc: An action that simulates pressing Return in the object, such as a text field.

items.name: static let decrement: NSAccessibility.Action
items.desc: An action that decrements the value of the object.

items.name: static let delete: NSAccessibility.Action
items.desc: An action that deletes the value of the object.

items.name: static let increment: NSAccessibility.Action
items.desc: An action that increments the value of the object.

items.name: static let pick: NSAccessibility.Action
items.desc: An action that selects the object, such as a menu item.

items.name: static let press: NSAccessibility.Action
items.desc: An action that simulates clicking an object, such as a button.

items.name: static let raise: NSAccessibility.Action
items.desc: An action that simulates bringing a window forward by clicking on its title bar.

items.name: static let showAlternateUI: NSAccessibility.Action
items.desc: An action that shows an alternate UI, for example, during a mouse-hover event.

items.name: static let showDefaultUI: NSAccessibility.Action
items.desc: An action that shows the original or default UI; for example, during a mouse-hover event.

items.name: static let showMenu: NSAccessibility.Action
items.desc: An action that simulates showing a menu by clicking on it.

items.name: var description: String?
items.desc: Returns a standard description for an action.
